home.description: Explore the art of Goju Ryu Karate

theory.title: Theory
theory.description: Principles and knowledge of Goju Ryu
theory.historyDesc: The origins and evolution of Goju Ryu

videoError.title: Unable to load video
videoError.instructions: Please ensure the following files exist:

ageUke.name: Age Uke
ageUke.description: A block that deflects an attack upward, protecting the face and upper body.

gedanBarai.name: Gedan Barai
gedanBarai.description: A sweeping block that deflects attacks aimed at the lower body.

sotoUke.name: Soto Uke
sotoUke.description: A block that deflects an attack from the inside to the outside.

uchiUke.name: Uchi Uke
uchiUke.description: A block that deflects an attack from the outside to the inside.

shutoUke.name: Shuto Uke
shutoUke.description: A block performed with the side of the hand.

empiUke.name: Empi Uke
empiUke.description: A block performed with the elbow.

kosaUke.name: Kosa Uke
kosaUke.description: A block performed with crossed wrists.

jujiUke.name: Juji Uke
jujiUke.description: A block performed with crossed arms forming an X shape.

haiwanUke.name: Haiwan Uke
haiwanUke.description: A block performed with the back of the forearm.

study.description: Interactive lessons and tests to enhance your knowledge

bunkai.description: Explore the practical applications of kata techniques

vitalPoints.description: Understanding the key pressure points and targets in Goju-Ryu Karate

hojoUndo.title: Hojo Undo
hojoUndo.description: Traditional supplementary exercises and training equipment of Goju-Ryu Karate

kumite.description: Learn the sparring techniques and principles of Goju-Ryu Karate
